Multimedia.lessonRelevance: For Part 2: An atmospheric video plays as students enter the classroom, immediately immersing them in the lesson's sights, sounds, geographic location, and sense of mystery.
Part of a fun simulated data collection activity. Students "introduce" both sexes of a set of species (by vocalizing and dancing) and build a data table.

QuickPrep:
1. Watch Video(s) for Part 1
2. Look over <AnchorLink href="#background"> Background </AnchorLink>
3. Look over <AnchorLink href="#procedure"> Procedure </AnchorLink>
4. <AnchorLink href="#teaching_materials"> Teach it! </AnchorLink>
5. Repeat for each part and <AnchorLink href="#feedback"> tell us what you think. </AnchorLink>
